sub_title: Senior Global Executive | Driving Global Strategy & Growth
summary:
I am a global management professional with 18+ years of experience driving business development operations. I am skilled in catapulting revenues and growing market share via strategic planning and delivery as well as creating and leading high performance teams. 

Having lived and worked across 5 continents in Canada, Singapore, Spain, Brazil and the Netherlands and worked extensively in North and South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Asia, I have had the humbling and amazing opportunity of holding a variety of senior leadership roles in Account Management, Project Management, Biz Dev, Customer Success and Sales.

Along the way, I picked up a few languages which I can use at a full commercial level. Up until Covid I continued to travel extensively and strived to still find time to enjoy life with my wife, raise two kids and walk a Golden Retriever and Chocolate Labrador Retriever (now sadly gone).

I moved back to Europe mid 2022 and chose the greatest and most dynamic tech hub (only second to London) on the continent as my home. 

Always very interested in expanding my network so please feel free to reach out 

Specialties: Team Culture | Team Transformation | Full Sales Lifecycle Management | e-Commerce Operations | Reporting | Employee Engagement | Customer Service Optimisation | Account Management | Business Partnerships | High-Impact Presentations | Stakeholder Relations | Negotiations | Coaching | Strategy Planning | Product Development | Market Management | Supplier Relations | Channel Management

projects.title: TravelAds EMEA
projects.description:
I took an active part in opening and launching the TravelAds product in Europe while I was based in Brazil

TravelAds is an auction model, pay-per-click program designed specifically for our merchant hotel partners. With online tools and reporting, you control your content and ad-spend, measure effectiveness and optimize your campaigns — all in real time.

Our global affluent audience is browsing 100,000+ curated items, ranging from rare supercars and private jets to celebrity-owned luxury real estate.
profile_positions.title: VP of Sales

profile_positions.description:
Go1 is a World leader in online learning.

During my tenure, I focused on nurturing their partner network to support continuous business growth in 2022 and 2023. My main responsibility was crafting and executing a growth strategy for Singapore and the wider Asian market. This strategy not only expanded our partnerships but also boosted their market presence, setting Go1 up for long-term success in the region.


- Secured distribution partners by generating annual recurring revenue (ARR) worth $1.5M within less than nine months and establishing a post-departure sales pipeline of $11M.

- Identified and promoted scalable distribution channels to increase accessibility and dissemination of the world's largest curated eLearning library from premier content providers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager, Partnerships - Asia

profile_positions.description:
Led a high-performing team of Account Managers and Sales Representatives to drive regional host community growth and achieve exceptional results. Devised and implemented streamlined procedures to improve sales cycle and account management. Developed robust strategies for Account Managers and Representatives to improve client satisfaction and sales revenue.

Key Accomplishments

Transformed team's sales approach from transactional to consultative by incorporating key components of SPIN selling.

Achieved consistent revenue growth and sustainability in vital markets by directing development and execution of supply strategy and operations spanning Southeast Asia, Hong Kong, and Taiwan.

profile_positions.description:
During my tenure, I oversaw the entire sales lifecycle by implementing process improvements and leading a team of 13 account management specialists in the Indochina and Myanmar regions. This leadership role led to streamlined operations and a substantial boost in revenue. I also managed a quarterly budget of $10M to support our strategic goals.

• Achieved a threefold increase in hotel partnerships within the span of under two years through strategic leadership of a high-performing sales team.

• Established six new offices by co-ordinating with legal, tax, and real estate teams to configure and launch new facilities.

• Enhanced business performance in specified regions by introducing relevant marketing and business approaches to drive revenue expansion.

#Sales Lifecycle Management #Operations Optimisation #Budget Management

I formulated a go-to-market strategy and personally orchestrated high-level partnership negotiations with C-level executives across 13 South American countries. This initiative was instrumental in driving strategic business expansion efforts in the region, solidifying Expedia Media Solutions' market presence and paving the way for sustainable growth.

• Successfully launched Expedia Media Solutions by cultivating strong client relationships across South America, the United States, the European Union, and Australia/New Zealand (ANZ).

• Executed commercial transformation that propelled revenue growth from $250K to $4M, resulting in achieving 85%+ profit margins and cementing Expedia Media Solutions' reputation as trusted regional partner.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Founded in 1937 as Foster Parents Plan, they started out by providing direct aid to individual children and families. As their work grew and evolved over many decades, they learned that lasting change for children requires a plan for the entire community. In 2006, they simplified our name to Plan to better reflect how they work.

Today, they are one of the world’s oldest and largest international development agencies.
Not for profit, independent and inclusive of all faiths and cultures, Plan has only one agenda: to improve the lives of children.

I volunteered as a translator of their newsletter for members

TalentTrust improves the lives of disadvantaged people in Singapore by uniting senior business leaders with ambitious charities that want help.

Based on a successful UK charity-model, TalentTrust partners with businesses to introduce a new caliber of skills-based volunteering to Singapore.

Working only with the most skilled senior leaders, TalentTrust ensures its members are best-placed to provide considered and meaningful advice to charities, whilst at the same time stretching and further developing the valuable talents of the members themselves.
